message: Here is the documentation on the shields.  http://asynclabs.com/wiki/index.php?title=AsyncLabsWiki
We have 6 AsyncLabs WiShields at the lab.  I tested them and four work, two do not.  I have labeled them and put them in a brown paper bag.
I put one on the LED sign, grabbed one for myself and am thinking of setting up one for the garden to let us know when the water has run out.
